specialOffers.title: Special Offers

about.title: About Us

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We help emerging sellers reach their customers easily. Therefore, we won't charge any fees for adding products, but we ask that prices be reasonable to ensure everyone can shop.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: We want to be the place that brings together emerging sellers and buyers. We sell products at wholesale and competitive prices, so everyone benefits. We believe that when we cooperate together, God will provide for us all.

support.title: Supporting Emerging Sellers
support.description: We provide an opportunity for emerging sellers to reach their customers without any additional fees

affordable.title: Affordable Prices
affordable.description: We ensure that prices are suitable for everyone to facilitate shopping

community.title: Cooperative Community
community.description: We encourage cooperation between sellers and buyers to create a successful and thriving community

owner.title: Store Owner
owner.description: Website owner with extensive experience in technology

salesManager.title: Sales Manager
salesManager.description: Responsible for managing sales and developing marketing strategies

delivery.title: Delivery Manager
delivery.description: Responsible for delivering orders and ensuring they arrive on time

wholesale.title: Wholesale Trader
wholesale.description: Responsible for product supply and wholesale trade

computers.title: Computers and Laptops
computers.description: We offer a wide range of computers and laptops from the best global brands at competitive prices

accessories.title: Computer Accessories
accessories.description: A variety of high-quality accessories such as headphones, keyboards, mice, and more

maintenance.title: Maintenance Service
maintenance.description: A specialized team for maintaining and repairing electronic devices with quality and speed guarantee

delivery.title: Fast Delivery
delivery.description: Fast delivery service to all areas with guaranteed excellent product condition

about.whatsappMessage: Hello, I'm interested in learning more about the electronics store

locations.title: Our Locations
locations.description: Visit one of our store locations to experience our products in person. Our friendly team is ready to assist you with all your needs.
locations.enterMapboxKey: To display an interactive map of our store locations, please enter your Mapbox key.
locations.getFreeKey: You can get a free Mapbox key from mapbox.com

careers.title: Join Our Team
careers.description: We are always looking for talented individuals to grow with us. Explore our currently available positions below.

footer.aboutDescription: We are committed to offering high-quality products with excellent customer service. Our mission is to make shopping an enjoyable experience for all customers.
footer.address: Revolution St. 2, off Petroleum St., El Marg, behind One Day Hospital, Cairo, Egypt
